DOC.brief_summary: In 2015-2016 , 224,390 case newly diagnose lung cancer USA . Of case , 83 % non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) . Currently , 5-year survival rate NSCLC patient 21 % , 25 % early stage NSCLC patient , undergone surgical treatment , relapse progression . Circulating tumor cell ( CTCs ) , shed primary tumor vasculature lymphatics , regard new prognostic factor metastatic process . Thus far , CTCs-detection technology divide epithelial cell adhesion molecule ( EpCAM ) -based detection method , e.g. , widely use CellSearch速 Adnatest速 , EpCAM-independent detection method , e.g. , ISET速 ScreenCell速 . Herein , investigator use newly establish approach , i.e. , CanPatrolTM detect CTCs early stage lung Adenocarcinoma case . The investigator aim explore whether CTCs detection prior surgery contributive early diagnosis , may help predict prognosis guide treatment strategy early stage lung Adenocarcinoma .
DOC.brief_title: Application Detecting Circulating Tumor Cells Accurate Treatment Early Stage Lung Adenocarcinoma
DOC.criteria: stage I lung adenocarcinoma case new adjuvant treatment prior surgery
